fields.name: Snapper Rocks
fields.description: Snapper Rocks is a world famous point break located on the southern end of the Gold Coast. It is a high performance wave that can produce long rides and fast barrels. The wave is best surfed on a medium to large swell and a light to moderate westerly wind. The best time to surf Snapper Rocks is on a low tide. The wave is best suited to intermediate to expert surfers.
